name: Chicken Shock Giga Omelette
description:
Chicken Shock Giga Omelette is a 2D fast paced multiplayer shooter. 

There are currently 3 playable game modes in which you can play in teams or FFA. You start with a small portion of the 33 weapons and unlock them quickly through playing. 

Create and play on your own maps with the map editor ! 

By purchasing the Golden Egg edition, you will start playing with every weapons and hats unlocked. Buying this version allows you to support the team, especially by financing servers.

For any questions or problems, join the community our Discord server !
Just click here : https://discord.gg/krMWKTw
